com.twitter.heron.integration_test.common.bolt

Class JSONTweetFilterBolt

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.twitter.heron.api.topology.BaseComponent
      • com.twitter.heron.api.bolt.BaseBasicBolt
        • com.twitter.heron.integration_test.common.bolt.JSONTweetFilterBolt
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBasicBolt, IComponent, java.io.Serializable

    public class JSONTweetFilterBolt
extends BaseBasicBolt
    A bolt that read a tweet in json format, and then filter out the tweets, whose the top-level property given is equal to the value given, and emit it. Example, given the property "lang" and value "zh", this bolt will read a tweet and emit the tweet , whose "lang" is "zh"
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Process the input tuple and optionally emit new tuples based on the input tuple.

        All acking is managed for you. Throw a FailedException if you want to fail the tuple.
